commands.command_description: this commands is a command to create a 3d object at a certain position

arguments.name: object_type
arguments.description: object type allowed types are (box, capsule, cylinder, prism, sphere, torus, plane)

arguments.name: pos
arguments.description: position of the object in the format [x, y, z]

arguments.name: scale
arguments.description: scale of the object in the format [x, y, z]

arguments.name: orientation
arguments.description: orientation of the object in the format [x, y, z] with values in radians

arguments.name: color
arguments.description: rgb color of the object in the format [r, g, b] with values in the range 0-1
